Package mainForm

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
mainForm.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
The Inventory class is a static class which holds the program's list of parts and products.
Author:
Jason Jackson

  • Method Details

    • addPart

      public static void addPart​(Part newPart)
      This method adds a part to the Inventory's allParts list.
      Parameters:
      newPart - the part to be added to the Inventory.

    • lookupPart

      public static Part lookupPart​(int partId)
      This method checks the Inventory's parts list to see if a match is found based off the partID field.
      Parameters:
      partId - the ID to be checked against the Inventory's part list.
      Returns:
      the Part if it is found, otherwise null.

    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart​(String partName)
      This method checks the Inventory to see if a part by the name of the partName parameter exists, then returns any parts matching the partName as a list.
      Parameters:
      partName - the String to be checked against the parts list.
      Returns:
      a list containing any Parts that match the partName.

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart​(int index, Part selectedPart)
      This method updates the Inventory's parts list to the new selectedPart value at the part index given.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the updated part.
      selectedPart - the new value of the Part.

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart​(Part selectedPart)
      This method deletes the part given as a parameter from the Inventory's parts list.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - the Part to be deleted from the inventory.
      Returns:
      a boolean whether the deletion was successful or not.

    • getAllParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      Getter method to return allParts.
      Returns:
      the allParts list.

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct​(Product newProduct)
      This method adds a product to the Inventory's product list.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - the product to be added to the Inventory's product list.

    • lookupProduct

      public static Product lookupProduct​(int productId)
      This method checks the Inventory's product list to see if a match is found based off the productID field.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID to be checked against the Inventory's product list.
      Returns:
      the product if it is found, otherwise null.

    • lookupProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct​(String productName)
      This method checks the Inventory to see if a product by the name of the productName parameter exists, then returns any products matching the productName as a list.
      Parameters:
      productName - the String to be checked against the products list.
      Returns:
      a list containing any Products that match the productName.

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct​(int index, Product selectedProduct)
      This method updates the Inventory's product list to the new selectedProduct value at the product index given.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the updated product.
      selectedProduct - the new value of the Product.

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct​(Product selectedProduct)
      This method deletes the product given as a parameter from the Inventory's products list.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - the product to be deleted from the inventory.
      Returns:
      a boolean whether the deletion was successful or not.

    • getAllProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      Getter method to return allProducts.
      Returns:
      the allProducts list.
